doc.field: Gay USA, Vol. XVI, Episode No. 27 [Air date: 7/2/1998]
Gay USA, Vol. XVI, Episode No. 27 [Air date: 7/2/1998]
COMMERCIAL: Homo Xtra (HX), "The one. The only. The original."
1. Andy Humm and Ann Northrop discuss recent general events that relate to the LGBT community.
2. Footage from CSPAN regarding the "Legal Age of Homosexual Consent" in the United Kingdom.

3. Footage of Pride Month event in which Mark Green, [politician], honors activists at City Hall. Includes footage of Harry Bartel and Brian Landeche, owners of Splash bar; Craig Lucas, playwright; and Betty Santoro, member of Lesbian Feminist Liberation.
4. Footage of activists protesting the mayor's participation in the Lesbian and Gay Pride March.
6. Interview: James LaRocca, candidate for the Democratic primary for Governor of New York, discusses his political platform with respect to LGBT issues.
7. Footage of Tom of Finland at the Manhunt Party.
8. Nora Burns discusses recent nightlife and entertainment-related events that relate to the LGBT community.
10. Footage of the 1998 Gay and Lesbian Pride Parade. Includes footage of NYC politicians Margarita Lopez, Peter Vallone, Rudy Giuliani, Alan Hevesi, and Mark Green.
